name: Digimon Apocalypse
description:
Learning that a new genna is coming, the dark forces take action. After losing the young genna, the digital world falls apart. 6 seasons together. Choose your digivice and your partner and save two worlds.

* There is evolution in war. The evolved digimon is returning to its old form at the end of the war.
* Each digivice has its own unique feature.
* You can use cards, data and digimemory as a skill by using the main hero.
